localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: A large collection of ready to used library to design and prototype your ideas, faster. More than 250+ building blocks with 150+ screen template. Available for Figma, Sketch, XD
nodes.title: Bloo Lo-fi Wireframe Kit - Open source wireframe kit for design and prototyping
nodes.author: vijay verma

nodes.excerpt: A weekly updated collection of hand picked tweets specially tailored to save time and give great reading experience. Consider it as a new way to consume Twitter.
nodes.title: Growth Tweets - Weekly-updated repository of tweets that matter
nodes.author: Ankit Ghosh

nodes.excerpt: Test the most important parts before developers release to reduce CS tickets. Reduce tickets with the tests and let us explain what went wrong to your developers
nodes.title: Preflight - Detect console and network errors before the release
nodes.author: Mustafa Bayramoglu

nodes.excerpt: SocialQ+ is a virtual social media superhero that lets you collaborate, schedule & analyze your posts for Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, telegram, reddit, tumblr, rss feed team member LinkedIn & Youtube from the same spot.
nodes.title: SocialQ+ - Marketing platform for social networks
nodes.author: SocialQ+

nodes.excerpt: What if you were paid to learn a skill? UniU is a newsletter that incentivises ambitious people to learn a new skill & apply what they're learning by offering crypto bounties for completing learning tasks. Information is nice, action changes everything.
nodes.title: UniU - A newsletter that pays you to learn future skills
nodes.author: Tim Hatherley-Greene

nodes.excerpt: FocusLite blocks websites either by schedule, or by budget per day. (# visits + duration). For extra motivation, you can "start a streak" for a fee. If you lose the streak, you lose your money!
nodes.title: FocusLite - Website blocker for Mac & consumable purchase for motivation
nodes.author: Vojtech Rinik

nodes.excerpt: Why struggle to come up with fresh writing prompts when you can get them in an instant? It makes a wide variety of topics and themes available at the touch of a button.
nodes.title: Writing Prompts - Never run out of writing ideas again
nodes.author: Ayush Pathak

nodes.excerpt: Language learning is hard... so we made it soft. It's time to turn your bathroom into a classroom with our latest innovation: toilet paper that teaches you phrases in new languages! Never miss a lesson again, because nature is the best push notification.
nodes.title: Duolingo Roll - Turn your bathroom into a classroom
nodes.author: Jack Morgan

nodes.excerpt: Cobrowse any website with your teammates! Vera co-browsing makes it possible for you to co-browse any website with your friend--to work on a Google Doc, to watch a video together-- free to chat as long as you want! More collaborative feature will be added!
nodes.title: Vera Co-Browsing - Co-browse Google Docs, Figma, videos, PDFs or any website
nodes.author: Han Su

nodes.excerpt: Create your blog. Make it beautiful. Make it yours. Your personal space to tell your story, share your photos, or record what you love about life. Other 1MB members can follow your blog and like your blog posts. Your blog hosted on 1MB's fast & secure network.
nodes.title: Blogging by 1MB - The easy way to host your website or blog
nodes.author: Dalton Edwards

nodes.excerpt: Q.Money is not another Bank - we connect all your accounts to become your money's ally. Please note: currently we support Banks in the following Countries: Spain, Portugal, Germany, UK, France.
nodes.title: Q.Money - Â¡Not another bank! - Manage all your accounts with just one login.
nodes.author: Andrei Popov

nodes.excerpt: Resemble AIâ€™s new built-in integration with GPT-3 can generate realistic ad copy and conversations instantly. You can use the existing library of professional voices, or create your own custom AI voice, to generate high-quality voiceovers and dialogues.
nodes.title: GPT-3 Custom AI Voices - Combine GPT-3 with custom high quality AI voices
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Learn to better cope with stress and anxiety by mastering the basics of the CBT theory and by implementing that theory into your everyday life. Devote 20 minutes a day to yourself.
nodes.title: Therappy - Cope with stress and burnout
nodes.author: Innokenty Nesterenko

nodes.excerpt: Nuke button replies to all the pending emails telling them you'd get back to them in a few days. And then over the next few days, it shows you those emails (1-2 per day) so you can respond to them without getting overwhelmed. â € Fastest way to inbox zero.
nodes.title: Nuke Your Inbox by Mailman - A big red button that, when pressed, nukes your inbox ğŸ’£ğŸ’¥

nodes.excerpt: Wormhole lets you share files with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires.
nodes.title: Wormhole - Simple, private file sharing
nodes.author: Feross Aboukhadijeh

nodes.excerpt: Freelanium is a platform for freelancers to charge their clients quickly, safely and without commissions, in addition to being able to have all their activity organized on the same platform
nodes.title: Freelanium - All in one easy agreements platform for freelancers
nodes.author: Alex Hernandez

nodes.excerpt: This file includes a bunch of experiments with interactive components in Figma to create some motion in your design. You can download Figma Beta to use interactive components.
nodes.title: Motion - Interactive components in Figma to create motion
nodes.author: Pavan Kusuma

nodes.excerpt: PDFChef by Movavi is an easy and reliable PDF editor and viewer: create PDF, edit PDF text, rotate, rearrange, and extract PDF pages, import images, convert files, and more. Work with PDFs on Windows or Mac using a desktop app, online service, or mobile app.
nodes.title: PDFChef by Movavi - Edit and convert PDF files online, right in your browser
nodes.author: Natalia Utyasheva

nodes.excerpt: Wesat makes it easy to create invoices and contracts for your clients. No matter your freelancing needs, Wesat can help. Our subscription-free pricing model is great for beginners and pro freelancers alike.
nodes.title: Wesat 2.0 - Everything you need for your freelancing business
nodes.author: Kash Goudarzi

nodes.excerpt: not less but better is the digital wellbeing app that helps you become resilient to digital distraction. Learn healthy phone use with 5 minutes of practice a day and feel in control again. Developed by psychologists, backed by science, and proven to work.
nodes.title: not less but better - Build healthy phone habits with 5 minutes a day ğŸ˜Œ
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Stack is an experimental product from Google's internal incubator Area 120 which makes it easy to scan and organize your documents. It uses Google Cloud's Document AI to understand the meaning of the documents you scan, or upload from your camera roll.
nodes.title: Stack by Area 120 at Google - All your documents, organized with Google's document AI
nodes.author: Gabor Cselle

nodes.excerpt: Watch, share, and record video messages on the go with Loom for Android.
nodes.title: Loom for Android - Mobile screen recordings with a cam bubble
nodes.author: Nicolette Yadegar
